scoring.title: Scoring
scoring.MilitaryOther: Additional 1 for each more than anyone else
scoring.FavourOther: Not scored if monarch's health is not 0
scoring.kingdomZero: 6 for most in any category where kingdom has 0.
scoring.mostLeastSharing: Adjustments for most least are divided evenly between everyone who shares the most/least.
scoring.rounding: All fractional scores are rounded down (1 Popularity is worth 0). Multiple fractional scores are each rounded not summed.
scoring.atLeast20: If the highest score is less than 20, everyone loses.

game.created: A new Game is created with identifier {{ param }}
game.updated: A Game is updated with identifier {{ param }}
game.deleted: A Game is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Game {{ id }}?
